Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Ready to drive Copilot adoption? Discover seven actionable strategies to inspire and empower users to achieve more with Copilot. From launching Copilot Chat and activating champions to modeling AI habits and creating hands-on experiences, you'll walk away with ideas to spark usage and impact.
